description: Works great! Just doesn't see .hidden folders, such as /home/username/.steam/.

Other sourceports such as gzdoom will not work on my laptop no matter how hard I try to get them to work. This port plays extremely well and looks really good, the only gripe I have is that since ubuntu is kind of stupid when it comes to midi, you will most likely have to listen to the lower quality opl music opposed to the higher quality midis.

why is there hebrew in the text files
now i gotta deploy the claymore roomba because now im paranoid the feds are gonna bust down my door
summary: why is there hebrew in the files
